author: Arman Azad, CNN
title: Adjusted coronavirus model predicts fewer people in US will need hospitals, but 82,000 will still die by August
description: An influential model tracking the coronavirus pandemic in the United States now predicts that fewer people will die and fewer hospital beds will be needed compared to its estimates from last week.
content:
(CNN)An influential model tracking the coronavirus pandemic in the United States now predicts that fewer people will die and fewer hospital beds will be needed compared to its estimates from last week.
As of Monday, the model predicted the virus will kill 81… [+5228 chars]
